name: Island Bones
description:
“Island Bones” is a RogueLite Shooter about surviving with waves of skeletons on an island. While the player is waiting for salvation, he can collect bones from skeletons to get and upgrade skills, which he can lose after death. The sets of skills change every time - player's builds are not repeated
 The game was created in 2 days for the IGD Halloween GameJam 2021. The theme was “Spooky Scary Sceletons“ Controls:
  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space
